summary.what: Added timbers changelog command that generates markdown changelogs from ledger entries, grouped by tag
summary.why: Markdown output over structured JSON because changelogs are human-readable documents not machine data. Group-by-tag with duplication over primary-tag assignment because discoverability in context matters more than deduplication. Default to all entries unlike export/query because a changelog without content is useless and requiring --last 999 is hostile UX.
summary.how: New changelog.go following export.go patterns: newChangelogCmdInternal with storage injection, reuses getEntriesByLast/getEntriesByTimeRange/filterEntriesByTags from entry_filter.go, groupEntriesByTag with alphabetical sort and Other-last ordering, formatTagTitle for section headers, both markdown and JSON output paths. Table-driven tests cover grouping, filtering, tag duplication, custom titles, JSON output, and empty states.
